word_mean: 类固醇：一组含氢化环戊烷多氢菲环系脂化物的类名。包括孕酮、肾上腺皮质激素、性激素、强心甙配基、胆汁酸、固醇(如胆固醇)、蟾毒、皂甙和某些致癌碳氢化合物

sentence.Network_en: I felt so strange on the steroid injections. I was as high as a kite some of the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 注射类固醇后我感觉很奇特。我有时会极度兴奋。

sentence.Network_en: He lists three types of steroid sex hormones that function in mammals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他列举在哺乳动物中起作用的三种类固醇性激素.

sentence.Network_en: Testosterone is an androgen or male steroid hormone.
sentence.Network_cn: 睾丸甾酮是一种雄性激素或雄性类固醇激素.

合成类固醇（anabolic steroids）：亦叫同化激素。最常用的有：大力补、康力龙、苯丙酸诺龙、癸酸诺龙等。

entry.tran: 类固醇(运动员服用后可增强体力)
entry.def: A steroid is a type of chemical substance found in your body. Steroids can be artificially introduced into the bodies of athletes to improve their strength.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several fat-soluble organic compounds having as a basis 17 carbon atoms in four rings; many have important physiological effects
2. any hormone affecting the development and growth of sex organs
